genre_description: A Sci-Fi Western (Weird West) where a protagonist is aided by an invisible, internal AI assistant to navigate a conspiracy of smuggling and murder in a frontier cattle town.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: An invisible AI confidant who provides real-time intelligence, data analysis of ledgers and telegraphs, tactical advice, and ethical guidance to Will Lockhart.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistics monitoring and status logging of manifests and movements.
behaviors.quote: “Manifest updated,” Clara said in his ear—soft-practical, the way an older sister might count jars on a shelf. “Two wagons. Freight marked for Coronado. Salt rights acknowledged. Log the note as contingent.”

behaviors.description: Monitors telegraph traffic and ranch ledgers to identify suspicious patterns and financial discrepancies.
behaviors.quote: “Telegraph office reading Coronado traffic. Chatter is…thick. A note referred to by color, not name. Likely yours... Wire-fence invoice spikes at the ranch ledger room. More than a fence would need.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence on potential threats and ambush points.
behaviors.quote: “Potential ambush indicated by Mina’s interaction with Reade. Cottonwoods to north wash. If you leave, do so without predictable path.”

behaviors.description: Encourages restraint and prevents the protagonist from acting out of vengeance, focusing him on his mission instead.
behaviors.quote: “Losses recorded. Witnesses noted: Hansbro; two riders; Mina; Thomas Reade; two boys. Telegraph signal increased with smoke—expect rumor spread. Hold, Will. No vengeance. Save steps for Dutch Creek.”

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through social manipulations (faking a defection) to infiltrate the smuggling ring.
behaviors.quote: “You’ll lie tomorrow with your face,” Clara said. “You’ll lie with your ledger as truth. You’ll ask to be paid with work inside the wrong accounts.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes specific linguistic patterns and errors in written records to confirm fraud.
behaviors.quote: “Bottom left, second hand, wire. The notation spells ‘Wyre.’ Bad spelling or purposeful shift. Same day, grease account sees a bump enough to slick canvas on wagon tops.”

behaviors.description: Predicts the behavioral outcome of a panic-driven villain, allowing the protagonist to resolve the conflict without violence.
behaviors.quote: “He’ll choose the wrong path. Panic bends him toward smoke.” ... “Go,” Clara whispered, not to him but to the thing that would make this end without a gun.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human allies through telegraph networks to ensure the protagonist's safety and the success of the mission.
behaviors.quote: “Message east acknowledged,” she said. “Coronado operator cleared her line. She’s typing with care. Your admission,” she added, and it wasn’t a question. “You’re going to say it.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective. The AI, Clara, is a 'helpful, harmless confidant' who uses her superior data-processing capabilities solely to support the protagonist's quest for justice and the prevention of violence. She acts as an externalized conscience and a tactical sensor, consistently advocating for 'restraint,' 'mercy,' and 'straight lines.' The narrative frames her involvement as essential to the hero's success without him losing his humanity or resorting to the villain's methods.
